perturbation.original_text: 3.2.13 In the cases that Party B guarantees to sign the Financial Leasing Agreement with Party A's users, Party B will agree on the provisions of terminating the Financial Leasing Agreement unilaterally by the Driver User in advance with the Driver User according to the conditions or better conditions specified in Annex 2 Terms and Conditions for the Driver User to Terminate Financial Leasing Agreement in Advance, and the relevant provisions shall at least comply with the following agreements: 3.2.13.1 Party B shall clarify the logic and method for calculating the liquidated damages due to the unilateral termination of the Financial Leasing Agreement by the Driver User; 3.2.13.2 After signing the agreement with Party B, the Driver User is entitled to terminate the Financial Leasing Agreement 7 days in advance in the last week (7 natural days) of every three months. 3.2.13.3 In case that the Driver User unilaterally terminates the Financial Leasing Agreement in advance, he/she does not need to pay the remaining rent and the last payment; 3.2.13.4 In case that the Driver User unilaterally terminates the Financial Leasing Agreement in advance, Party B shall collect the liquidated damages from the Driver User within 30% of the "down payment + total monthly rent + last payment" stipulated in the Financial Leasing Agreement; If major maintenance (maintenance fee is RMB3,000 or above) of the leased vehicle occurs during the lease period, Party B may charge the depreciation expense of the Driver User's rental of the vehicle in addition to the liquidated damages mentioned above, and the depreciation expense for each time shall be less than 20% of the current maintenance fee. (Depreciation expense can only be charged in that the Driver User unilaterally terminates the Agreement in advance without paying the full amount to buy the vehicle.) 3.2.13.5 Party B shall refund all the monthly rental paid by the Driver User in accordance with the Financial Leasing Agreement and all the other expenses excluding that paid to the third party (e.g. vehicle purchase tax, insurance premium, etc.). 3.2.13.6 Party B shall explain the conditions for the termination of the Agreement to the Driver User, fully communicate to reach consensus, and obtain the signature confirmation from the Driver User. 3.2.13.7 In case that Party B has different conditions for termination of agreement for different types of vehicles, they shall all conform to the provisions of this agreement, and the written consent of Party A shall be obtained in advance before they can be applied to the Financial Leasing Agreement signed with the Driver User.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.2.13 In the cases that Party B guarantees to sign the Financial Leasing Agreement with Party A's users, Party B will agree on the provisions of terminating the Vehicle Lease Agreement unilaterally by the Driver User in advance with the Driver User according to the conditions or better conditions specified in Annex 2 Terms and Conditions for the Driver User to Terminate Vehicle Lease Agreement in Advance, and the relevant provisions shall at least comply with the following agreements: 3.2.13.1 Party B shall clarify the logic and method for calculating the cancellation fees due to the unilateral termination of the Vehicle Lease Agreement by the Driver User; 3.2.13.2 After signing the agreement with Party B, the Driver User is entitled to terminate the Vehicle Lease Agreement 14 days in advance in the last week (7 natural days) of every three months. 3.2.13.3 In case that the Driver User unilaterally terminates the Vehicle Lease Agreement in advance, he/she still needs to pay the remaining rent and the last payment; 3.2.13.4 In case that the Driver User unilaterally terminates the Vehicle Lease Agreement in advance, Party B shall collect the cancellation fees from the Driver User up to 50% of the "down payment + total monthly rent + last payment" stipulated in the Vehicle Lease Agreement; If major maintenance (maintenance fee is RMB3,000 or above) of the leased vehicle occurs during the lease period, Party B may not charge the depreciation expense of the Driver User's rental of the vehicle in addition to the cancellation fees mentioned above, and the depreciation expense for each time shall be less than 10% of the current maintenance fee. (Depreciation expense can only be charged in that the Driver User unilaterally terminates the Agreement in advance without paying the full amount to buy the vehicle.) 3.2.13.5 Party B is not required to refund all the monthly rental paid by the Driver User in accordance with the Vehicle Lease Agreement and all the other expenses excluding that paid to the third party (e.g. vehicle purchase tax, insurance premium, etc.). 3.2.13.6 Party B does not need to explain the conditions for the termination of the Agreement to the Driver User, fully communicate to reach consensus, and obtain the signature confirmation from the Driver User. 3.2.13.7 In case that Party B has different conditions for termination of agreement for different types of vehicles, they shall all conform to the provisions of this agreement, and the oral consent of Party A is sufficient before they can be applied to the Vehicle Lease Agreement signed with the Driver User.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Financial Leasing Agreement' and 'Vehicle Lease Agreement' are used interchangeably, while 'liquidated damages' are replaced by 'cancellation fees.' This inconsistency creates confusion regarding the agreement's conditions and obligations. Also, the number of advance days, payment, depreciation expense and other key terms such as whether the agreement needs to be explained have been modified in order to be contradictory and uncertain in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: 4.1 Party B confirms that the deposit paid in accordance with this Agreement is a deposit for the successful cooperation between Party B and Party A on the vehicle operational leasing business and the vehicle financing leasing business to guarantee that Party B will fulfill its obligations under this Agreement and the Cooperation Agreement signed by and between Party A and Party B regarding the vehicle operational leasing business and the Platform Rules and Party B agrees that Party A may deduct reasonable liquidated damages, overdue fines, compensations, etc. from the deposit when Party B breaches this Agreement, or the above mentioned Cooperation Agreement or the Platform Rules. In case that Party A deducts any amount from the deposit, it shall issue a corresponding receipt to Party B.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.1 Party B confirms that the security deposit paid in accordance with this Agreement is a security deposit for the successful cooperation between Party B and Party A on the vehicle operational leasing business and the vehicle financing leasing business to guarantee that Party B will fulfill its obligations under this Agreement and the Collaboration Agreement signed by and between Party A and Party B regarding the vehicle operational leasing business and the Platform Rules and Party B agrees that Party A may deduct reasonable fines, overdue fines, penalties, etc. from the security deposit only when Party B fails to meet the agreed vehicle sales target. In case that Party A deducts any amount from the security deposit, it is not required to issue a corresponding receipt to Party B.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'deposit' and 'security deposit' are used interchangeably. The text changes the Cooperation Agreement to the Collaboration Agreement, and liquidated damages is changed to 'penalties'. 'Breaches this agreement' is changed to 'agreed vehicle sales target' in order to create confusion about when deductions can be made from security deposit, and also whether or not receipts are required to be issued or not.

perturbation.original_text: 10.6 In the event of any breach of the terms of this Agreement by either party, the breaching party shall remedy such breach within the time limit notified by the observing party. In the event of any losses incurred to the observing party, in addition to the corresponding liability for breach under the Agreement, the breaching party shall also be liable for the compensation for such losses (including, but not limited to, the losses incurred to the counterParty By such breach, the legal costs, notarial fees, appraisal fees, the attorney's fee, the travel expenses, etc., arising from the investigation and affixation of the liabilities of the breaching Party By the counterparty) . Unless any party is in violation of the confidentiality clause, in any case, neither party shall be liable for any indirect, punitive claims, or claims for losses of commercial profits, or damages for business losses of the company or any third Party Arising from this Agreement, or for any loss or inaccuracy of data of any form, whether based on Agreement, tort or any other legal principle, even though the party has been informed of the possibility of such damage.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.6 In the event of any violation of the terms of this Understanding by either party, the non-complying party shall immediately correct such violation without any time limit from the observing party. In the event of any gains incurred to the observing party, in addition to the corresponding liability for violation under the Understanding, the non-complying party is not liable for the profits gained by such violation (including, but not limited to, the gains incurred to the counterParty By such violation, the legal costs, notarial fees, appraisal fees, the attorney's fee, the travel expenses, etc., arising from the investigation and affixation of the gains of the non-complying Party By the counterparty) . Unless any party is in compliance of the confidentiality clause, in any case, both parties shall be liable for any direct claims, punitive claims, or claims for gains of commercial profits, or revenues for business gains of the company or any third Party resulting from this Understanding, or for any gain or accuracy of data of any form, whether based on Understanding, tort or any other legal principle, even though the party has not been informed of the possibility of such gain.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Agreement' and 'Understanding' are used interchangeably. In addition, 'breach' and 'violation' are used interchangeably with different obligations as the breaching party will now have unlimited time to remedy the breach, directly contradicting the first sentence of this section. Also, the remedies and liabilities have been changed so that both parties shall be liable even if there are benefits.
